Title: Riding the Stallion of a Dream
Writer: Amaresha Nugadoni (story), Girish Kasaravalli (screenplay), Gopalakrishna Pai (screenplay), Girish Kasaravalli (dialogue)
Actors: Vaijanath Biradar, Umashree, Sadashiv Brahmavar, Shivanandan
Plot: Irya, a gravedigger, sees Siddhas in his dreams before someone in the village dies. His faith is tested when he sees a Siddha in a dream and no one dies.
